question: How can I list my property for rent?
answer: Go to your dashboard, tap 'Add Property', fill in the details, and click 'Submit'.

question: How do I contact a landlord?
answer: On the property page, tap 'Contact Landlord' to send a message directly.

question: Is there a fee for listing a property?
answer: No, listing a property is free. We only charge a small service fee upon successful transactions.

question: What documents do I need to rent in the neighborhood?
answer: ID, proof of income/first payment. Remember, always do your research before making decisions.

question: How do I prepare my house before listing it for rent or sale?
answer: Clean, declutter, fix small issues, and upload clear photos. On Qarba, quality images and honest descriptions help your listing stand out and attract serious renters or buyers.

question: Do I need an agent to sell my property?
answer: No, you can sell directly without an agent. On Qarba, you can list your property, interact with buyers, and close deals without paying agent commissions.

question: How long does it take to sell a house?
answer: It can take weeks  depending on pricing, location, and demand. On Qarba, boosted listings and accurate pricing help properties sell faster.

question: Are there taxes when selling property?
answer: Yes, property sale taxes may apply depending on local laws. Qarba recommends confirming with your local authority or legal advisor before completing a sale.

question: How do I make my house more appealing to buyers?
answer: Clean thoroughly, repair visible issues, and use neutral styling. Listings with neat presentation on Qarba get more requests and faster closing.

question: Do real estate agents negotiate deals?
answer: Yes, agents help negotiate prices and contract terms. On Qarba, you can negotiate directly or bring your agent into the chat.

question: Do I need a home warranty?
answer: A home warranty gives buyers peace of mind for repairs. Qarba encourages sellers to offer warranties when possible for faster sales.

question: Should I get a home inspection before buying?
answer: Yes, inspections help you avoid hidden problems. On Qarba, we recommend always inspecting property physically before payment.

question: Can foreign buyers purchase property?
answer: Yes, depending on country laws. Qarba helps overseas buyers connect with verified property owners safely.

answer: You can, but legal review is recommended. On Qarba, we encourage using legal professionals to avoid disputes.

answer: It states terms when working with an agent. On Qarba, private owners can list freely without binding contracts.

answer: Yes, virtual tours increase visibility and save time. Qarba supports property videos and virtual viewing appointments.

answer: Closing is when payment is completed and ownership transfers. Qarba encourages escrow use for safe closing.

question: Will my rent increase every year?
answer: Rent rearly increases yearly. Qarba helps track rental history and increase transparency.

question: Do tenants pay utilities?
answer: Utility payment rules depend on your lease agreement. Qarba listings clearly show what utilities tenants pay.

answer: Only if the landlord allows it. Qarba encourages transparency and landlord approval before subletting.

answer: Contact the landlord before your contract ends. Qarba reminders help tenants renew on time.

question: Do I get my security deposit back?
answer: Yes, if there’s no damage and rent is paid. Qarba promotes fair rental practices for both parties.

question: Can I run a business from a rented home?

question: Why should I list on Qarba?

question: Can I negotiate rent with a landlord?
answer: Yes! Many landlords are open to negotiation, especially when you’re a reliable tenant. Always approach politely and bring reasons like long-term stay or good rental history. On Qarba, our messaging system lets you negotiate clearly and respectfully.

question: How do I attract quality tenants?
answer: Quality tenants look for clean, well-maintained homes and responsive landlords. Provide good photos, accurate descriptions, and fair rules. On Qarba, verified landlords and clear listings build trust — helping you attract responsible tenants faster.

question: Do I need to stage my property before selling?
answer: Staging isn’t mandatory, but it can make your home look more appealing and help buyers imagine living there. Even simple touches like plants and tidy rooms help. Qarba gives staged listings higher engagement and visibility.

question: What should I disclose when selling property?
answer: Honesty wins trust. Be transparent about ownership, repairs, structural issues, and legal status. Qarba supports transparency — verified listings and clear details protect both sides and speed up deals.

answer: Compare similar homes in your neighborhood, consider size and condition, and look at recent market trends. On Qarba, our insights and upcoming valuation tools will help you price confidently and competitively.

question: Where can I find available properties for rent or sale?
answer: On the homepage, use the search bar to choose property type, location, and budget. You can also use filters to narrow your search by bedrooms, amenities, or price range.

question: How do I post a new property listing
answer: click “List Property” at the top right, and fill in the details — property type, location, price, and images. Qarba guides you step-by-step until your listing goes live.

question: How do I edit or update my property listing?
answer: Go to your Dashboard > My Listings, select the property you want to edit, and click Edit Listing. You can update photos, prices, or details anytime.

question: How do I use filters effectively on Qarba?
answer: After searching, click Filter to refine results by location, price range, bedrooms, bathrooms, and property type. Qarba instantly updates the listings that match your preferences.

question: How do I switch between rent and buy options?
answer: On the homepage or search page, toggle between Rent and Buy tabs. Qarba separates listings by category so you can easily focus on what you’re looking for.

question: Is there a map view to explore properties by location?
answer: Yes! Click “Map View” while browsing listings. You’ll see properties pinned by area, helping you visualize proximity to roads, schools, or workplaces.

question: How do I view property photos and videos?
answer: Click any listing to open the property page. Swipe or scroll through the image gallery, or play the embedded video if available. Qarba supports HD photos and walkthroughs for clarity.

question: Can I sort listings by newest or cheapest?
answer: Absolutely. Use the Sort By dropdown to choose Newest, Lowest Price, or Highest Price. Qarba automatically reorganizes listings based on your choice.

question: Where can I find my account settings?
answer: Go to Profile > Settings. From there, you can manage your password, notification preferences, and personal details.

question: How do I delete a property listing?
answer: In My Listings, select the property and click Delete Listing. Confirm the action — once deleted, it will be removed from Qarba’s public search.

question: How do I report a problem with the site or app?
answer: Scroll to the bottom of any page and click “Help & Support” or “Report an Issue.” You can also reach us via support@qarba.com for technical help.

question: Does Qarba have a mobile app?
answer: Yes! Qarba is available on both Android and iOS. The app offers the same smooth navigation as the website, with real-time notifications

question: How do I log out of my account?
answer: Click your Profile icon in the top corner, then select Log Out. Qarba keeps your session secure until you’re ready to return.

question: I forgot my password, how do I reset it?
answer: it happens! Just tap “Forgot Password” on the login screen, enter your registered email or phone number, and follow the reset link we send you. You’ll be able to create a new password and regain access to your Qarba account in minutes.

question: I didn’t receive the password reset email or SMS — what should I do?
answer: First, check your Spam/Junk folder or SMS inbox. If you still don’t see it, request another reset. Make sure you entered the same email/number used when you signed up. Still stuck? Contact Qarba Support and we’ll help you recover your account safely.

question: Why is Qarba asking me to verify my phone number or email again?
answer: To keep your account safe. Verification helps prevent unauthorized access and protects your property listings, messages, and personal data.

question: : Can I log in from multiple devices?
answer: Yes, but Qarba may occasionally ask for verification if we detect a new device or location — just to make sure it’s really you.

question: Can someone hack my account if they know my email or phone number?
answer: Not without your password or verification code. Qarba uses secure authentication and optional 2FA. Never share your password or SMS codes with anyone.
